thread.title: Instagram user can now post video also
thread.title_full: Instagram user can now post video also

title: Instagram user can now post video also
text:
Instagram user can now post video also 
Emirates 247 Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Instagram unveiled a new feature allowing users to post one-second video "loops" in an effort to keep up with rivals offering animated images. 
"Boomerang" is a new video application "that lets you turn everyday moments into something fun and unexpected," the Facebook-owned picture-sharing network said in a blog post. 
"Capture a friend jumping off a diving board, defying physics as she flies back and forth through the air. Transform an ordinary selfie with your friends into a funny video. Get that exact moment your friend blows out his birthday candles, then watch them come bac...
